overview: Included in this softcore erotic video magazine are “Lay It Again, Sam” about a gumshoe (Marc Wallice) who gets a little too close with his client (Laurie Smith), “Sandy... Red Hot and Chauffeur Driven” with a model (Pippi Anderson) posing for a photographer (Nikki Randall) in a desert locale, “EB Reports - Personal Services” about a phone sex business that connects adult stars with fans and actors trying out for an adult fairly tale in "Cinderella Casting."
title: Electric Blue 12
